refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the modulus of an arbitrary precision number

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the modulus as a new BcMath\Number object.

refsect1.simpara: When the BcMath\Number::scale of the result object is automatically set, the larger BcMath\Number::scale of the two numbers used for modulus operation is used.
BcMath\Number can perform modulus operation using operators. The calculation with the operator behaves the same as when the method argument scale is &null;.
